item.title: Do you approve or disapprove? The Setup Checklist
item.description: Every Dynamics GP implementation presents the challenge of effectively training users during the configuration phase. I admit, I was hesitant to embrace the setup checklist (Microsoft Dynamics GP»Tools»Setup»Setup Checklist) at first. However, I recently decided to give it another try. For those unfamiliar, the Setup Checklist grants users access to most setup screens needed for system configuration. This tool is valuable because it presents tasks in the required order, preventing unnecessary jumping between modules.
